ThingDef.label: Battery pack
ThingDef.description: The easiest source of energy.

ThingDef.label: Improved battery pack
ThingDef.description: New energy storage technologies increase capacity.

ThingDef.label: Energy grid batteries
ThingDef.description: Advanced technology has created high-capacity batteries with almost no increase in size.

ThingDef.label: Silicon nanowire batteries
ThingDef.description: Batteries in which silicon nanowires with a diameter of 100 nm and a length of several microns are used instead of graphite anodes. This made it possible to further increase the capacity.

ThingDef.label: minified nuclear reactor
ThingDef.description: Reduced nuclear reactor. Still effective, but takes up much less space, so it can be used in a wider range of objects. Radioactive.

ThingDef.label: minified cold fusion reactor
ThingDef.description: Reduced cold fusion reactor. Still effective, but takes up much less space, so it can be used in a wider range of objects.

ThingDef.label: minified arc reactor
ThingDef.description: Reduced arc reactor. More effective than a cold fusion reactor, is its direct modification.

ThingDef.label: Condenser batteries
ThingDef.description:
Module for MK station

A battery pack that slowly accumulates energy. Used as a secondary station power supply. Charges armor when the station is not connected to the main power source (if there is a charge). Charges when the power to the station is active. 

The slowest and low-capacity batteries.

ThingDef.label: Robotic manipulators
ThingDef.description:
Module for MK station\n\nA set of robotic manipulators to simplify the repair and modernization of armor. They are designed to provide a more detailed improvement in armor due to a special artificial intelligence.
Allow you to install a second level of modules for armor.

ThingDef.label: Nanorobots
ThingDef.description:
Module for MK station\n\nLiquid enriched with specially programmed nanorobots for very fine work. Moreover, due to their size and type of fluid, they can penetrate where people cannot.
Opens the last level of modules for armor.

ThingDef.label: Transformers
ThingDef.description: Module for MK station\n\nA step-up transformer with a winding of steel allows you to increase the speed of charging armor.

ThingDef.label: Power accelerator
ThingDef.description: Module for MK station\n\nAccelerator and enricher charged particles. Increases the speed of charging armor, and thanks to a special design allows you to activate power overload to use the maximum power (attention: explosive!)

ThingDef.label: Energy cell
ThingDef.description: Module for MK station\n\nEnergy cell accumulating a small amount of energy and radiating with increased power. Provides increased armor charging speed.

ThingDef.label: 'Nano-yolk' high capacity
ThingDef.description: Module for MK station\n\nThe hollow shell of titanium dioxide, inside which (like the yolk in the egg) is a filler of aluminum powder, sulfuric acid and titanium oxysulfate. The size of the filler can vary regardless of the shell. The use of such particles allowed a three-fold increase in the capacity of the batteries, and significantly reduce the charging speed.

ThingDef.label: Instruments
ThingDef.description: Module for MK station\n\nA set of tools for basic armor upgrades.

ThingDef.label: Guidance system
ThingDef.description:
Module for Armor

Target illumination and guidance system. Thanks to the thermal imager and laser guidance, it was possible to provide additional accuracy, especially when shooting in bad weather

Provide extra accuracy.

ThingDef.label: Basic filtration system
ThingDef.description:
Module for Armor

Basic air filtration systems. Help with not serious air poisoning

Protects against easy effects of air poisoning

ThingDef.label: Echo System 'Plato'
ThingDef.description:
Module for Armor

The echo system “Plato” allows you to control the situation by 360 degrees due to the many helmet-mounted sensors located throughout the helmet. Therefore, there will be no unforeseen attacks from the back

Increases Dodge Chance

ThingDef.label: Advanced filtration system
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nAdvanced air filtration system. It includes a special technology of a closed circuit, thanks to which not only protection against serious air poisoning is achieved, but also the consequences of supercooled/superheated air

ThingDef.label: Stimulants
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nStimulants mounted directly in the armor provide targeted adrenaline injections, accelerating the wearer and reducing the chance of shock

ThingDef.label: Reinforced Armor Cloth
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nComplex fabric consisting of microparticles and using the technology of a reflective firewall, additional provides protection against conventional and electronic attacks

ThingDef.label: Reinforced plates
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nReinforced plates made of an alloy of steel and plasteel are inserted into the armor to increase its effectiveness

ThingDef.label: Antitoxic seals
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nHermetically sealed armor provides improved protection against radiation, gases, toxic substances and temperature

ThingDef.label: First aid interface
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nMicroprocessors built into the armor control the state of the vital systems of the body and carry out the directed allocation of small doses of panacelin to speed up the healing process.

ThingDef.label: Active plates
ThingDef.description:
Module for Armor

Experimental plates that change their angle under the projectile to create a rebound angle.
Increase Armor Absorption.

ThingDef.label: Protein therapy of antigenesis
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nModule stimulates the formation of blood vessels in all parts of the body, which increases the user's ability to withstand damage and at the same time weakens the negative effects of wounds

ThingDef.label: Adrenaline injectors
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nSpecial injectors that passively inject small doses of adrenaline into the blood. Increases movement speed, aiming and attack power.

ThingDef.label: Kinetic buffer
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nMetabolism accelerator controls the state of vital systems of the body and injects genetically modified stimulants to increase combat skills and athletic abilities.

ThingDef.label: Security interface
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nImproved VI systems control enemy fire and redistribute energy to vulnerable points.

ThingDef.label: Combat exoskeleton
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nThis experimental armor combines a mechanical amplifier and a firewall, increasing the physical strength of the fighter and providing protection from traditional weapons.

ThingDef.label: Medical exoskeleton
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nThis experimental armor combines a mechanical amplifier and a firewall, increasing the physical strength of the fighter and providing protection from traditional weapons.

ThingDef.label: Shock absorbers
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nThe installation of micro gravimetric mechanisms in the armor provides more convenient movement.

ThingDef.label: Motorized joints
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nSpecial mechanisms that help joints. Allow you to move faster and more convenient.

ThingDef.label: Ablation coating
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nThe ablation coating is separated upon impact, removing the impact energy produced by bullets and shells from the body. It can be used 10 times, after that the coating needs to be changed.

ThingDef.label: Shield Modulator
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nModulator generating an energy field around the armor. The force field is enough to reflect small damage. It requires the energy that it takes from the suit reactor.

ThingDef.label: Energy boots
ThingDef.description: Module for Armor\n\nShoes accelerating its owner due to strong adhesion to the surface and the release of a small amount of energy. Increases energy consumption.
